mary_comont: Hannah, it’s Mary (we met when I was Lucy’s flatmate). So sorry to hear everything you’ve been through. Looks like you’re doing really well though! He did tonnes of sport and cycling, (he used a great brand called under armour to protect his stoma). They found there wasn’t much awareness at the time so it will be amazing for others to see your story and feel that they’re not alone. Hope you recover really really soon and take care of yourself xxx
danyszelsky: Sorry to hear that you are going through this. I know it's a very difficult experience physically and mentally My mom had one too a few years ago due to a bad surgical procedure.
